name.en: Humanities Project: Reality Games in Philosophy
name.ch: 人文應用專題：哲學裡的實境遊戲

goal.ch: 以《孟子》為文本，透過RPG劇本寫作，將孟子章節化作劇本，運用桌遊與larp搭配實務案例進行思辨訓練，最終呈現文本轉譯的思辨能力。
goal.en: Using the text of Mencius as a basis, we will write RPG scripts that adapt the chapters of Mencius into scenarios. We will utilize board game and live-action role-playing (LARP) in practical cases for reflective training, ultimately demonstrating the translational critical thinking skills of the text.

outline.ch:
運用桌遊與larp模式拆解孟子文本，3、5為遊戲化概述，為7、9、11週進行RPG劇本思辨遊戲化訓練，雙數周進行《孟子》文本閱讀與情節拆解，並且連結實際生活情境來進行哲學訓練。

outline.en:
We will deconstruct the text of Mencius using board game and LARP (Live-Action Role-Playing) modes. Weeks 3 and 5 serve as a gamified overview, with weeks 7, 9, and 11 dedicated to RPG script-based critical thinking exercises. Even-numbered weeks will focus on reading and dissecting passages from Mencius while linking them to real-life situations for philosophical training.
Midterm reports will be distributed over these 5 weeks of RPG subtopics.
In week 15, we will produce the final Mencius script. Week 16 will be reserved for presenting the final projects.

textbook.ch:
1. 大衛‧愛德蒙茲 ，《你該殺死那個胖子嗎？：為了多數人幸福而犧牲少數人權益是對的嗎？我們今日該如何看待道德哲學的經典難題》，劉泗翰 譯，臺北：漫遊者文化，2017。
2.邁可‧桑德爾，《正義：一場思辨之旅》，陳信宏 翻譯，臺北：先覺出版社，2018。
3. 傑西．謝爾，《遊戲設計的藝術》，大家出版，2021。
4.羅伯．薩波斯基 ，《行為：暴力、競爭、利他，人類行為背後的生物學》，八旗文化，2019。
5.《孟子》（任何版本皆可）
textbook.en:
1.David Edmonds, Would You Kill the Fat Man?: The Trolley Problem and What Your Answer Tells Us about Right and Wrong(Taipei: AzothBooks, 2017.)
2.Michael J. Sandel, Justice: What’s the Right Thing to Do? (Taipei: Sense Press, 2018.)
3.Jesse Schell,The Art of Game Design: A Book of Lenses, Third Edition(Taipei: Common Master Press, 2021.)
4.ROBERT M. SAPOLSKY, BEHAVE：THE BIOLOGY OF HUMANS AT OUR BEST AND WORST(Taipei: Gūsa Press, 2019.)。
5.Mencius (any version)
